overview:
Ryan Harwood is the CEO of PureWow, a digital media company that produces lifestyle content for stylish, influential women looking for unique finds. Harwood founded PureWow in 2010 in partnership with the women behind wowOwow.com (Joni Evans, Whoopi Goldberg, Candice Bergen, Lesley Stahl) after noticing a void in the digital landscape for the often-overlooked Gen X female.

Prior to starting PureWow, Harwood worked for Goldman Sachs & Co. for five years and was instrumental in the development of the newly formed Goldman Sachs Private Bank. He is a graduate of the Wharton School of Business at the University of Pennsylvania. Harwood was a two-time captain of the menâ€™s varsity tennis team at Penn and also played professional tennis during the 2003-2004 season.
